# The Lonely Wizard
### A 2D Top-Down Rogue-Like Shooter

### Built with
![C#](https://img.shields.io/badge/C%23-321C8C?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,&logoColor=fff&style=for-the-badge)
![Unity Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Unity-FFF?logo=unity&logoColor=000&style=for-the-badge)


Overview
This Unity game was developed with C# after my first Computer Science course at UNLV. Inspired by my favorite rogue-like games such as Risk of Rain 2 and Hades, I found the courage to dive into game development during winter break. Through brainstorming and creative exploration, I learned the fundamentals of game mechanics, from designing a player controller to implementing enemy tracking and attack patterns.

Features
- **Custom Enemy Walk Paths**: Designed to enhance gameplay by creating unique challenges and strategies for players.
- **Dynamic Leveling System**: Allows players to upgrade their abilities, providing a personalized gaming experience and encouraging skill development.
- **Responsive Player Controller**: Ensures smooth movement and attack mechanics for an immersive player experience.
- **Wand Weapon Mechanic**: Features a wand that shoots fireballs, offering engaging combat options and varied attack strategies.
